menu_dialog_become_infamous_prestige:
You will pay 80% of your money, but no more than $6.000.000 cash and $24.000.000 offshore.

You will gain one rank of Infamy. If you are at Infamy rank 100 or below, you will also receive an Infamy Reward.
IR_dialog_cs_claim_rewards_text_addition: If the experience gained is enough to increase your Infamy rank by 2 or more, then the promotion to the desired rank will happen automatically. For each Infamy rank, you will pay 80% of your money, but no more than $6.000.000 cash and $24.000.000 offshore.
IR_popup_text: Your Infamy rank has been increased to:
